name: Arvix
description:
*All assets were made during the jam

Time and space have broken down. It is up to you to save time itself when it ceases its march; yet, you are more than capable to twist through its numerous puzzles. However, there is always a cost to delaying future's unrelenting arrival.

. . .

Controls:

~ If something breaks press "R" to reset! ~

~ WASD/ Arrow Keys -  to move ~

~ X - Interact / Move crates ~

~ Z - Rewind time ~

. . .

Made in a week for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2. The theme was "Rewind"

Our first attempt at a proper 3D game during jame conditions, hope you enjoy!

. . .

Made by:

  • ItsNotSimon - Programming
  • Ren3 - 2D Art/Environment
  • K4talyst - Art/Music
  • Metricfern - Level Design

. . .
